tag_list: search-engine-optimisation, online-marketing, social-media-monitoring, media-monitoring, marketing-strategy-development, website-development, website-design
overview:
Genna’s key areas of work include communication and marketing, for which her experience is diverse, ranging from government to private sector, international security to information communication technologies.

Genna is passionate about technologies that change the world, and considers an innovative and entrepreneurial mind set crucial to the success of any young company. In response, she is currently the Director of Communications and Marketing, and member of the Management Board for TaDaweb SA, a young company ready to change the way people interact with information available on the Internet.

With regard to marketing, her key areas of interest include Web 2.O, SEO and E-marketing. She has experience in the field of social media strategy and believes that it is emerging as a key contingent of all company marketing strategies. She also has experience in web design and website creation.

Genna is a passionate speaker and has presented at a number of events and conferences on topics including international counter security concerns, marketing psychology as well as market and communication strategy.

English is Genna’s mother tongue, however she can also speak french and have working experience in both languages

She possess a BA in International Relations and Psychology and I am currently a Master of Arts candidate and I have also undertaken 2 years of law. My key research areas include the influence of information communications technologies on conflict, in particular social networks. I have also researched in the area of cyber and information based warfare.

Specialties

  • Search Engine Optimisation
  • Online Marketing
  • Social Media Monitoring
  • Media Monitoring
  • Marketing Strategy Development
  • Influence of Social Networks on Political Uprising
  • Political Speech Analysis
  • Data Mining and Internet Information Gathering
  • Graphical Designing
  • Website development

relationships.title: Management Board, Director of Communications and Marketing
